students.name: Emma Johnson
students.notes: Emma shows excellent writing skills but needs to practice speaking more consistently.

students.name: Michael Chen
students.notes: Michael is an outstanding student with strong performance across all skills. Keep up the good work!

students.name: Sophia Rodriguez
students.notes: Sophia has shown improvement in writing but needs to focus on reading comprehension.

students.name: James Wilson
students.notes: James needs to dedicate more time to practice all areas of language learning.

students.name: Olivia Martin
students.notes: Olivia demonstrates exceptional reading comprehension and verbal skills. A pleasure to teach!

students.name: William Anderson
students.notes: William is making progress but needs to work on writing structure and grammar.

students.name: Isabella Thompson
students.notes: Isabella participates actively in class discussions and shows strong comprehension skills.

students.name: Benjamin Clark
students.notes: Benjamin needs additional support and regular practice to improve his language skills.

students.name: Mia White
students.notes: Mia has good overall skills with particular strength in writing. Could benefit from more speaking practice.

students.name: Ethan Davis
students.notes: Ethan produces excellent written work and demonstrates strong analytical skills in reading.
